title: Bronze/Silver LFT Duo/Team for this season
body:
LFT a duo/team for this season, main support but been learning more of adc/top. Been on and off last season but want to grind out this time and get to Silver/Gold (gotta take dem baby steps before going further). I have a mic, mainly use discord.

Add Me: Trident Pandi

replies.body: Too easy, throw us an add, in loading screen atm
